content: आयत् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} <ab>Ved.</ab> Coming, approaching; °वसु one to whom good or wealth comes.

आयत् {c1c} <ab>A.</ab> {@--1@} To strive, endeavour. {@--2@} To rest or depend on, rest with (with <ab>loc.</ab>); वयं त्वय्यायतामहे <ls>Mv. 1. 49</ls>, <ls n="Mv.">3. 34</ls>; <ls>Dk. 42.</ls> {@--3@} To arrive, come to, reach, dwell (<ab>Ved.</ab>).
